content:
A Golfing Experience

Golfing in the Poconos just got even better. Discover your best game at the Split Rock Golf Club, our 27-hole championship golf course nestled in the Pocono Mountains. The course’s unique design and natural terrain makes it challenging for all levels of play. With some of the most spectacular views in the entire Northeast, our course boasts undulating fairways and demanding water hazards.

Our fully trained professionals are always on staff to offer knowledgeable information on everything from your club choice to the latest trends in golfing apparel. Our teaching pros are also available to provide valuable advice and host a number of lessons and clinics for all abilities.

For more information visit: http://www.golfsplitrock.com
